1_AIoptionSelection.AIAmount: The amount of AI drivers to spawn.
1_AIoptionSelection.AILevel: The difficulty of the AI, with the hardest being about as fast as you.

A_mapSelection.Shoreline: An average-length map surrounded by water. Best suited for beginners and casual players.
A_mapSelection.Canyon: A long map with rises and falls, as well a big hole to fall into. Caution is advised when driving.

B_carSelection.Bansku: Higher top speed and slower acceleration. Better for longer maps.
B_carSelection.Sariua: The default experience, balanced in every way. Suitable for everyone.
B_carSelection.Tatato: With this car, you get turbo power and nothing else. Good for competition.
B_carSelection.Teimo: More turbo at the cost of acceleration. Recommended if you can drive consistently.

C_optionSelection.Laps: The amount of laps to drive.
